name: The New Light (Demo)
description:
Nick Santos is a college student whose life is about to get heated when he learn about his ancestry, and his connection to the Light Stone.

Will feature:

  • Multiple ending
  • Ending list (Once I figure out how to put one in the main menu >:\ )
  • Two love interests (or just none at all!)

Music Credits:

  • End of Summer by The 126ers
  • If I Had A Chicken by Kevin MacLeod
  • Believer by Silent Partner
  • LongStroll by Kevin MacLeod
  • The Bluest Star by The 126ers

*The game is still in process. And since I'm new to this, feedbacks would be awesome! Also, if there's any error please tell me!

To keep up with the news of the game, please visit my Tumblr!
